/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the streets, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in a palette of mostly white, black, and gray, traverse the roads, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the cityscape.
